snippet.title: The Saboteur Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description: What could an Irishman be doing in Paris? Climbing, jumping, shooting, racing, fighting and sabotaging, of course! Please find attached The Saboteur's first gameplay trailer. Fight , climb and race your way through 1940s Nazi-occupied Paris in Pandemic Studios upcoming action sandbox title The Saboteur, out Dec 8th for PC, PS3 and Xbox 360.
